channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia nearly doubles revenue on strong AI demand
item.description: Nvidia reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 3.4% lower, snapping a five-session winning streak, and silver fell 3.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Top 10 S&P 500 stock winners since Election Day
item.description: Policy stances from the incoming Trump administration, bullish quarterly earnings and an "Elon Musk premium" led to lofty stock returns, experts said.

item.title: What's Flying Higher Than Bitcoin? The Software Company Buying Up Bitcoin
item.description: MicroStrategy shares are a more popular bitcoin play than the cryptocurrency itself for many individual investors.

item.title: Gap shares surge as it raises guidance, touts 'strong start' to holiday
item.description: Gap said Old Navy's sales fell after hurricanes led to store closures and warm weather deterred sales in its kids category.

item.title: Intuit shares drop as quarterly forecast misses estimates due to delayed revenue
item.description: While Intuit reiterated its full-year view, the company said promotional changes in the current quarter will have implications for revenue timing.

item.title: Euro Could Hit Parity Against Dollar in Mid-2025
item.description: The dollar weakened against the euro, but Rabobank said the eurozone currency could fall to parity against the dollar by the middle of 2025 when U.S. ...

item.title: U.S Stocks Rise, Treasurys Rally as Investors Cheer Bessent Pick
item.description: Stocks and bonds were rallying in the first trading session since Donald Trump picked longtime investor Scott Bessent to serve as Treasury Secretary.

item.title: Macy's delays earnings release as it says employee hid up to $154 million in delivery expenses
item.description: Macy's delayed its results after it discovered an issue related to the reporting of delivery expenses.

item.title: Warren Buffett Donates Another $1 Billion. He Has Estate-Planning Advice for Everyone.
item.description: The legendary investor will again give a portion of his Berkshire Hathaway shares to four family foundations.
